title: No One Wants A Blitzcrank Nerf?
body:
*Cuz that grab needs some sort of mini delay like thresh's 0.5 delay hook.*

*I mean.... read this crap on his hook*

"ACTIVE: Blitzcrank extends his right hand in a line. The first enemy hit is pulled to his location, takes magic damage and is Stun stunned for 1 second."

replies.body: The really questionable part of his kit is the 500 (+1AP) damage 600 range AoE Silence on a champion with 2 other forms of CC.

its not questionable at all
blitzcrank is not a support champ, so he doesnt have support damage lol

I play Leona.

I want Blitzcrank to be picked in as many of my games as possible.
I think riot likes the cancer
Yeah Riot already nerfed Kalista, Zed, Lee Sin and now we are going to whine about support champs.
Blitz does have a delay. Its just half of threshes hook's delay

It already has a delay, and unlike Thresh's, he faces the exact direction he's firing it in.

I'm not saying Blitz is all fine, but the hook, while the most noticeable aspect of his kit is not the thing that would need to be touched to make him more manageable. He can take hits to his base damages, CD on his Ult, bonus MS and AS from his W... quite a few spots to bring him in line.
